name: Charm of Horror by Adnan Dani

metadata.name: Charm of Horror #1
metadata.description:
Walls have ears, doors have eyes, trees have voices, beasts tell lies, beware the rain, beware the snow, beware the man you think that you know.

This photo was taken on a foggy morning. I love to shoot in the mystery of fog to get surrealism in my photos. I specifically chose the trees in the background to give the photo a spooky look. Those branches without leaves give the vibes of an old forest. The lantern adds more mystery to the photo. The model behind that cover is definitely my brother.

PS: Anyone who collects 2 editions will enter a 1/1 Raffle :)
